description: This is an HTML webpage implementing a database viewer interface with embedded CSS styling and JavaScript for dynamic data fetching and rendering. It provides a UI for browsing databases, tables, and displaying table data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches and displays the list of available databases in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables within a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data from a selected table and renders it in tabular form.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table based on data records.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual cell contents, including handling objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for detailed view.
